antar bhāvitā ca upalakṣaṇa para tayā ekā icchā yat uktam saptatriṃśat icchā iti

original: ata evoktaṃ vimalaprabhāyām - aparamapi yatkiñcitsattvakṛtyamicchā tatsarvaṃ yoginīkṛtamantradhātuvaśāditi
analyzed: atas eva uktam vimalaprabhāyām aparam api yat kiñcid sattva kṛtyam icchā tat sarvam yoginī kṛta mantradhātu vaśāt iti

original: ata eva rajomaṇḍale nyāsanīyāni ṣaṭtriṃśadeva bījānyuktāni
analyzed: atas eva rajaḥ maṇḍale nyāsanīyāni ṣaṭtriṃśat eva bījāni uktāni

original: kintu tatra kolanecchāyāḥ śa~ iti bījasya pūrvadvāre vāme nyāsa ukto vañcanecchāyāḥ ka~ iti bījasya dakṣiṇadvāre vāme ahibandhanecchāyāḥ la~ iti bījasyottaradvāre vāme
analyzed: kintu tatra kolana icchāyāḥ śaḥ iti bījasya pūrva dvāre vāme nyāsaḥ uktaḥ vañcana icchāyāḥ kaḥ iti bījasya dakṣiṇa dvāre vāme ahibandhana icchāyāḥ laḥ iti bījasya uttara dvāre vāme
yat uktam vimalaprabhāyām saptatriṃśat icchā vāc maṇḍale sva sva kula bhedena sva sva dikṣu iti

original: etacca sarvamavaśyamityupagantavyamanyathā bahudhoktaṣaṭtriṃśadicchetyādi- vākyānāṃ parasparavirodhaḥ syāt
analyzed: etat ca sarvam avaśyam iti upagantavyam anyathā bahudhā ukta ṣaṭtriṃśat icchā ityādi vākyānām paraspara virodhaḥ syāt

original: āsāmicchānāṃ nivartanasvarūpāḥ pratīcchāḥ ṣaṭtriṃśat kāyamaṇḍalavediṣu pūrvavat svakulavaśāt
analyzed: āsām icchānām nivartana svarūpāḥ pratīcchāḥ ṣaṭtriṃśat kāya maṇḍala vediṣu pūrvavat sva kula vaśāt
sva sva dikṣu cakra īśa ādi tathāgatebhyaḥ nyāḥ sarvāḥ devatāḥ vicitra ratna mukuṭinyaḥ

original: iha yadā bhagavān kālacakro vajrasattvasvabhāvo vyavasthāpyate tadā haritavarṇokṣobhyena mudritaḥ
analyzed: iha yadā bhagavān kālacakraḥ vajra sattva svabhāvaḥ vyavasthāpyate tadā harita varṇa ukṣobhyena mudritaḥ

original: evaṃ viśvamātā yadā tvakṣobhyasvabhāvā tadā nīlākṣobhyamūrtyā vajrasattvena
analyzed: evam viśvamātā yadā tu akṣobhya svabhāvā tadā nīla akṣobhya mūrtyā vajra sattvena
evam hi jñāna vijñānayoḥ parasparam udraṇam bhavati
tat uktam vimalaprabhāyām parama jina pratijñāna bhavā viśvamātā jñānadhātuḥ vijñānadhātuḥ iti
atra jñānam śūnyatā karuṇā eka rasa akṣara mahā sukha jñānam
yadā tu kālacakraḥ vijñāna skandhaḥ tadā viśvamātā kāśa dhātu vajra dhātu īśvarī svabhāvā iti arthaḥ

original: ata evokta- kālacakramaṇḍalam māviṅgitā vajradhātvīśvaryā viśvamātreti vajradhātvīśvaryā sārdhaṃ vijñānaṃ garbhapadme mahāsukhacakre iti śeṣaḥ
analyzed: atas eva ukta kālacakra maṇḍalam vajradhātu īśvaryā viśvamātrā iti vajradhātu īśvaryā sārdham vijñānam garbha padme mahāsukhacakre iti śeṣaḥ
amogha siddhi ratneśa vairocana amita ābhāḥ harita akṣobhyeṇa mudritāḥ
athavā mogha siddhiratna īśena ratnasambhavaḥ mita ābhena vairocano kṣobhyeṇa haritena

original: samantabhadraḥ śabdavajrā sumbharājo'tinīlā'nilā rudro jambhalo vijayanāgaśca nīlākṣobhyamūrtyā vajrasattvena mudritāḥ
analyzed: samantabhadraḥ śabdavajrā tinīlā nilā rudraḥ jambhalaḥ vijayanāgaḥ ca nīla akṣobhya mūrtyāḥ vajra sattvena mudritāḥ

original: vajrapāṇirdharmadhātuvajrā uṣṇīṣacakrī raudrākṣī viṣṇuryamo jayanāgaśca haritākṣobhyeṇa
analyzed: vajrapāṇiḥ dharmadhātu vajrāḥ uṣṇīṣa cakrī raudra akṣī viṣṇuḥ yamaḥ jaya nāgaḥ ca haritākṣobhyeṇa

original: aparāstu devatāḥ kṛṣṇā amoghasiddhinā raktā ratnasambhavena pītā vairocana śvetā
analyzed: aparāḥ tu devatāḥ kṛṣṇāḥ amoghasiddhinā raktāḥ ratnasambhavena pītāḥ vairocana śvetā
ete ṣaṭ mudriṇaḥ tathāgatāḥ sa uṣṇīṣāḥ cīvara dhāriṇaḥ dhṛta bhū sparśa ādi mudrāḥ
mantra antarantu vistara trāsāt na uktam iti
kathyamānā api tathā ameyāḥ mūrti sampadaḥ
ambhobhṛt udvahati ambu vāridheḥ akṣayam payaḥ
śrī vajrabhṛt mūrti amṛta pravāhā duduñcat uccais sukṛta amṛta oghaiḥ
niḥsīma mūrtyā iva parasparābhiḥ parārtha kṛt syāt abhayaḥ kṛtīśaḥ
